subsection_content:
Signs of obesity are often easy to recognize, but not everyone is susceptible to the disease. People at risk of obesity include:
People often eat a lot of calorie-rich foods such as fried, greasy foods, fast food, soft drinks, alcohol, animal organs, animal skin...; People with a sedentary lifestyle, office workers, low frequency of physical activity; Postpartum women, especially those who do not breastfeed; People living in big cities have many amenities. Although modern life is more comfortable, it is  the reason for reduced physical activities.; Children born into families with obese people. If parents have normal weight, the child is less than 10% at risk of obesity. However, if the baby has an obese parent, this risk increases to 40%. Furthermore, if both parents are obese, the baby will have an 80% risk of becoming obese; Group of people with endocrine disorders.
Regular physical activity is an effective weight loss method.
subsection_title: beo phi.json. Subjects at risk of obesity

beo phi.json. Subjects at risk of obesity
Signs of obesity are often easy to recognize, but not everyone is susceptible to the disease. People at risk of obesity include:
People often eat a lot of calorie-rich foods such as fried, greasy foods, fast food, soft drinks, alcohol, animal organs, animal skin...; People with a sedentary lifestyle, office workers, low frequency of physical activity; Postpartum women, especially those who do not breastfeed; People living in big cities have many amenities. Although modern life is more comfortable, it is  the reason for reduced physical activities.; Children born into families with obese people. If parents have normal weight, the child is less than 10% at risk of obesity. However, if the baby has an obese parent, this risk increases to 40%. Furthermore, if both parents are obese, the baby will have an 80% risk of becoming obese; Group of people with endocrine disorders.
Regular physical activity is an effective weight loss method.
